document.full_text: kevin correia pitched shutout ball into the eighth inning before the pittsburgh pirates held on to beat the chicago cubs 4-2 on friday.
document.title: kevin correia wins league-leading 7th game as pirates beat cubs
lines_and_colors: kevin correia pitched shutout ball into the eighth inning before the pittsburgh pirates held on to beat the chicago cubs 4-2 on friday.
